QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct a.patid, eventdate, cast(a.patid as varchar) + ':' + cast(eventdate as varchar) VISIT_SOURCE_VALUE, consid place_of_service_source_value, right(a.patid,3) as care_site_id, cast((cast(a.patid as bigint)*100000000)+(DATEPART(year,a.eventdate) *10000)+ (DATEPART(month,a.eventdate)*100)+ DATEPART(day,a.eventdate) as bigint) as visit_occurrence_id, staffid from {sc}.consultation a JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND a.patid = ch.PERSON_ID order by a.patid
